properties.publicRemarks: Owner May Carry Financing! Amazing hilltop ridge peak with forever views! Property appears to have just enough buildable space, about 15,000sf, for a home on the summit crest. Ascending in the clouds 500ft above the base foothills. 20+ acres with a lower level only accessible by trails from the Santa Susana Park. SCE easement from Mesa Rd to the neighboring property to the west, runs along the ridge top. A 300ft drilled well is on the property. Survey completed. Once you have the road access you may be able to go off-grid solar with the well. Zoned Agricultural which offers many more uses. Awe inspiring vistas of the valley, the Santa Monica Mtns, the Verdugo Mtns, & shimmering city lights at night. Surrounded by natural rock formations & boulders blending a feeling of picturesque wilderness with the city below. Close to several trails & parks to replenish your vitality. The Rocky Peak trail head, Santa Susana State Park, a waterfall, The Labyrinth, Larry Trout Trail, Lilac Lane trail head & more. Short drive to all amenities. Horse property. Potential for a tax mitigation with the city or other government agencies. Get it under contract & get into your inspections & verify if it meets all your needs. Ask the listing agent about land lenders. Located in the LA city limits, close to the Ventura county border. For all questions on building & uses contact the LA city planners. For all questions on utilities buyers must contact the utilities agencies. Address is not assigned & for marketing purposes only. Photos are not of the property but taken nearby. GPS  34.25487, -118.62916   APN 2724-006-003 Adj 20 acres is also for sale from our office for a total of 40 acres.
